about_the_game:
Make a monster girl a "Friend" and go on adventures together!
This is a "Mystery Dungeon"-style roguelike game in which the terrain changes with each challenge.

■□■ Game System ■□■

This is a "Mystery Dungeon"-style roguelike game.
When the player does something, other monsters will also do it. The game uses a turn-based system.
The monster girls you meet during your adventures are acknowledged by giving them drinks, ignoring them from time to time, and comparing their strength. When you receive it, it becomes a "Friend" and fights with you.

■□■ Story ■□■

As an adventurer, "you" found yourself in a mysterious ward.
According to the monster "Tarte", who calls herself the village mayor in a nearby village, in order to escape from this ward, you have to
They had to defeat the "tower sorcerer" in the Tower of Return.

Defeat the sorcerer and get out of here safely...
Your mysterious adventure is about to begin!

name: Monster Girls and the Mysterious Adventure

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: 魔物娘と不思議な冒険～力の宝珠と帰還の塔～ - $18.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Monster Girls and the Mysterious Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Let's go on adventures with monster girls!! This game is Roguelike RPG.
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
